status_effects.name: Poison
status_effects.text: Your Opponents pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.

status_effects.name: Super Poison
status_effects.text: Your Opponents pokemon takes 3 damage in between both turns.

status_effects.name: Confusion
status_effects.text: Before your Opponents next attack they flip a coin. If Heads their active pokemon takes 2 damage instead.

status_effects.name: Paralyzed
status_effects.text: Before your Opponents next attack they flip a coin. If Heads nothing happens.

status_effects.name: Burn
status_effects.text: Your Opponents Pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.

status_effects.name: Recharging
status_effects.text: Your Pokemon does nothing on your next turn.

status_effects.name: Perish Song
status_effects.text: Your Opponents Pokemon is cursed and will faint in 5 turns from this attack. Your Pokemon cannot switch out or attack until this effect ends.

status_effects.name: Infatuation
status_effects.text: Your Opponents Pokemon's next attack does -3 damage.

status_effects.name: Power Boost
status_effects.text: This attack does +2 damage. Your Opponents Pokemon's next attack does +1 damage.

status_effects.name: Semi-Invulnerable
status_effects.text: Your next attack does no damage. Your Opponents Pokemon does half damage next turn.

status_effects.name: Seeded
status_effects.text: Your Opponents Pokemon takes 1 damage in between turns. This Pokemon gains +1 HP in between each turn.

status_effects.name: Getting Pumped
status_effects.text: For every consecutive attack with getting pumped add +1 damage to your next attack.

status_effects.name: Mimic
status_effects.text: Your Opponents Pokemon must use this Pokemon's move pool to attack next turn.
